title: New Investigator Award
description: This grant supports investigator-led research across the UK, encouraging innovative and impactful studies in various scientific disciplines, fostering early-career researchers and advancing foundational knowledge in critical areas.

title: Biomining Cohort
description: Focused on developing microbial systems for efficient resource recovery and recycling, this grant promotes sustainability by leveraging biotechnology for mining and waste material reutilization.

title: Research and Innovation Grant
description: Providing substantial funding for pioneering projects in technology and sustainability, this grant aims to drive transformative innovations that address pressing global challenges and opportunities.

title: Biosynthesis of Complex Biopharmaceuticals
description: This program funds the development of microbial cell factories designed for the biosynthesis of advanced monoclonal antibodies, driving breakthroughs in therapeutic biopharmaceutical production.

title: Environmental Bioremediation
description: Supports projects focused on environmental cleanup efforts through innovative biotechnology applications, addressing contamination and fostering sustainable practices for a healthier planet.

title: Programmable Biological Circuits
description: This grant funds cutting-edge research into designing synthetic gene circuits that enable precise cellular control for medical, agricultural, and industrial applications.

title: Marine Bio-Innovation Fund
description: Providing support for research into marine biodiversity, conservation, and ocean sustainability, this fund encourages innovative approaches to protect and sustainably manage marine ecosystems.

title: Climate-Resilient Agriculture Program
description: This program supports projects developing innovative agricultural solutions to combat climate change, ensuring food security and environmental resilience for future generations.

title: Renewable Energy Innovation Grant
description: Focused on renewable energy projects like solar, wind, and biofuels, this grant advances clean energy solutions for a sustainable and low-carbon future.

title: Advanced AI in Healthcare
description: Funding cutting-edge research into AI-driven solutions to enhance healthcare delivery, diagnostics, and treatment outcomes for transformative medical advancements.

title: AgriTech Innovation Challenge
description: Supporting the development of advanced technologies for modern agriculture, this grant addresses global food challenges with innovative, scalable solutions.
